mapper.select: select artcl_gu, artcl_dong, artcl_complx, artcl_nm, artcl_lat, artcl_lng, artcl_rd, artcl_rd_detail, dl_price, dl_depos, dl_rnt, dl_cont_ym, dl_cont_d from article inner join deal on (artcl_gu = dl_gu and artcl_dong = dl_dong and artcl_zip = dl_zip and artcl_bc = #{building}) where artcl_dong = #{searchName} or artcl_complx like #{searchName} ||'%' or artcl_nm like #{searchName} ||'%'
